left.role: Progressive Democratic State Legislator from Minneapolis
left.summary: Federal occupation unprecedented. One more incident away from catastrophic violence.

center.summary: Extremely serious but not yet at point of no return. Cooler heads could prevail.

right.summary: Unrest manufactured by radical left. Federal officers doing their lawful duty.

left.summary: Defining story of the era. Federal government occupation of Minneapolis.

center.summary: Federal agencies stonewalling. Both sides have legitimate grievances.

right.summary: Mainstream media disinformation campaign against federal law enforcement.

left.summary: Constitutional crisis of the highest order. Lawlessness wearing a badge.

center.summary: Genuinely novel territory. Federal government likely prevails legally.

right.summary: Immigration enforcement exclusively federal jurisdiction. Shooting justified.

left.summary: Economic damage severe. Could set Minnesota back a decade.

center.summary: Meaningful but not severe impacts yet. Duration is key variable.

right.summary: Market correction, not crisis. Enforcement creates level playing field.
